name: BLOOMING DELIGHT
description:
Ingredient: Peridot, Thai silver, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

Large Hill tribe fine silver tear-drop shape pendant with flower stamp decorated with faceted peridot hanging from a large simple sterling silver earring top. Approx. 1-7/8"L.

Gemstone Properties: Peridot is a stone of compassion and is associated with visions and mysticism. Its attributes include problem solving, strong will, the ability to sooth bruised egos and promote confidence. Peridot also bring abundance and prosperity; it assists in rebirth and renewal of all kinds. Peridot's friendly energy is excellent for healing, it enhances the healing and harmony of relationships of all kinds but particularly marriage and was sometimes used to promote marital happiness/romance.

name: MOON RIVER
description:
Ingredients:  Amber, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

This piece contains two types of amber - the middle link with cognac color amber wrapped with granulation; dangling beneath it is a warm egg yolk color amber bead. Approx. 1-1/4"L.

Gemstone Properties: Amber is noted in metaphysics to give a soothing, light energy that is both calming and energizing at the same time. It is said to help manifest desires and heighten intellectual abilities, clarity of thought, and wisdom.

This delicate pair features small flat sterling silver circle link and faceted smokey quartz (twisted teardrop cut, about 5/8"L). Approx. 2"L.

Gemstone Properties: Smokey quartz is a grounding and stabilizing stone; it brings calm and centering, lifts depression, enhances practicality, and generally removes negative energies, bringing happiness. Smokey quartz is also a good luck stone, it can also assist in tapping subconscious wisdom.

Gemstone Properties: Turquoise, the birthstone of December, is known as a master healer stone as it is said to help speed the healing process. Turquoise is sacred to both Native American and oriental traditions; it is associated with the sky and bringing sky energy to earth. It is very powerful for grounding and protection and can help promote honest and clear communication from the heart. It is also said to protect against pollution in the environment and to bring abundance.

Gemstone Properties: Labradorite is the legendary protectors of wanderers and path seekers; it is linked to faith and destiny. It was traditionally thought to promote visions and psychic ability. Labradorite is said to strengthen intuition, help one see through illusions and enhance self-reliance and is considered by mystics to be a stone of transformation. It is said to clear, balance and protect the aura. It is purported to help provide clarity and insight into your destiny, as well as attract success. It is used in metaphysics for dream recall, and finding ways to use dreams in daily life. Mystically, energies of stress and anxiety are reduced by labradorite.

name: CHERRY BLOSSOM
description:
Ingredients:  Ruby, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

Tiny genuine ruby dangling between sterling silver findings with cherry blossom prints. Approx. 1-3/8"L.

Gemstone Properties: Ruby brings and increases romantic love. They are believed to generate passion and assist with spiritual endeavors. It brings integrity, devotion and happiness. It also enhances generosity and brings prosperity. Ruby is a stone that has been known to be very protective of home, worldly possessions, children, and psychic protection. It is a stone of high energy and power that promotes healing on all levels.

name: HEARD THRU THE GRAPEVINE
description:
Ingredients:  Amethyst, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

Faceted sphere of dark amethyst dangling from vintage post earring top with climbing vine design. Approx. 1-3/8"L.

Gemstone Properties: Amethyst has long been called the “sobriety stone," it brings energies in mystical realms of stability, peace, calm, balance, courage and inner strength. It has also been used to help ease the pain of grief and promote happiness. Amethyst is reputed to be beneficial when dealing with legal problems and money issues, which can lead to prosperity and abundance. Amethyst is also used as protection for travelers.

description:

Beautiful faceted teardrop-shaped carnelian complemented by red coral, dangling from sterling silver hook earring top with swirl filigree design. Approx. 1-7/8"L.

Gemstone Properties: Carnelian is associated with motivation and is used to stimulate career growth. Believed to protect against fear, Carnelian was also employed to ward off melancholy, envy and rage. Carnelian is a stone of creativity, individuality and courage and also a stone of protection in general and protection and relief from anger, jealousy and fear. In addition it can help with manifestation of one’s desires, and brings good luck. Carnelian can help ease or remove sorrows. It also helps stabilize energies in the home.

description:

Vintage lily of the valley charm with small peach pearl dangling from sterling silver heart with granulation earring top. Approx. 1-3/4"L.

name: COWBOYS OF MONTANA
description:
Ingredients:  Turquoise, Hill Tribe fine silver, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

Get out your leather vest and cowboy boots, this pair with carved-bear turquoise and sterling silver feather charm sure will bring out your cowgirl spirit. Approx. 2-1/4"L.

Gemstone Properties: Turquoise, the birthstone of December, is known as a master healer stone as it is said to help speed the healing process. Turquoise is sacred to both Native American and oriental traditions; it is associated with the sky and bringing sky energy to earth. It is very powerful for grounding and protection and can help promote honest and clear communication from the heart. It is also said to protect against pollution in the environment and to bring abundance.

description:

description:
Ingredients:  Amber, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

Tiny sterling silver heart dangle with wire work on oxidized base and egg yolk color amber bead swinging freely beneath hook earring top with cognac color amber stone. Approx. 1-3/8"L.

Gemstone Properties: Amber is noted in metaphysics to give a soothing, light energy that is both calming and energizing at the same time. It is said to help manifest desires and heighten intellectual abilities, clarity of thought, and wisdom.

name: SPANISH CAVA
description: Ingredients: Lemon topaz, Hill Tribe fine silver, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

name: GREEN FAIRY
description:
Ingredients: Peridot, Hill Tribe fine silver, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

Made for peridot lover - large faceted peridot nugget (3/8"L) paired with Hill tribe fine silver dangle with fish print, suspending from lovely teardrop-shaped hook earring top with round peridot stone and granulation. Approx. 2-3/8"L.

Gemstone Properties: Peridot is a stone of compassion and is associated with visions and mysticism. Its attributes include problem solving, strong will, the ability to sooth bruised egos and promote confidence. Peridot also bring abundance and prosperity; it assists in rebirth and renewal of all kinds. Peridot's friendly energy is excellent for healing, it enhances the healing and harmony of relationships of all kinds but particularly marriage and was sometimes used to promote marital happiness/romance.

name: FLOWER FIELD
description:
Ingredients: Moonstone with iolite or black and red garnet, Bali silver, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

Beautiful faceted moonstone and tiny iolite ( or faceted black garnet with tiny garnet) dangling from sterling silver flower link, the sterling silver earring top has a round moonstone center. Approx. 1-1/4"L.

Gemstone Properties: Moonstone is associated with intuition, creativity and good fortune, and was used as a charm to promote nurturing. It is also believed to attract love, compassion and sympathy; it can help calm responses and avoid overreaction, and enhances feminine energies, sensitivity, intuition, and psychic abilities. Moonstone is a stone of protection, especially during childbirth, pregnancy, and travel at sea. It is also associated with love of all kinds.

name: GOLDEN TRIANGLE
description:
Ingredients: Citrine, marcasite, sterling silver, plus a full serving of love, care, and passion.

Sparkling faceted citrine in titanian cut emitting sunny warmth is decorated with Swiss marcasite, dangling from sterling silver earring top with round citrine stone. Approx. 1"L.

Gemstone Properties: Citrine is associated with a wide array of positive qualities, it is widely known as the stone of success and has been used in charms for money and abundance. Citrine is thought to promote optimism, harmony, instill self-confidence and to encourage clear thinking. It is also linked to creativity, wisdom and sound mental health. Citrine is known as a “success” stone because it is said in folklore to promote success and abundance, especially in business and commerce. Its lore also says that it enhances mental clarity, confidence, happiness and will power. Citrine is also a good general protection stone according to crystal healing lore. It is said to alleviate depression and self-doubt, and diminish irrational mood swings due to the effect of mental clarity it has.

Gemstone Properties: Green (grossular) garnet is a stone of confidence and stability in challenges; it is said to be particularly beneficial and stabilizing in lawsuits. Grossular Garnet is used for manifestation and both physical and spiritual abundance. It is also a stone of service, enhancing one's will and ability to serve and energizing cooperative efforts. Grossular Garnet is a fertility stone and said to particularly enhance fertility when one meditates upon it. 

Matching necklace available at: 
http://houseofphi.bigcartel.com/product/tree-of-life-necklace

Large sterling silver 'tree of life' pendant hanging on a sterling silver chain dazzling with wire-wrapped faceted tear-drop green apatite, close with a heart-shape lobster clasp. Approx. 17-1/2"L (adjustable).

Gemstone Properties: Apatite is a stone that mystically can stimulate the thoughts and ideas; it is said to increase intellect, imagination, and intuitive awareness. As a meditation or awareness tool it is said to help you maintain focus, learn, concentrate effectively, think clearly, and communicate better. Apatite can be used to enhance the energies of other crystals and stones.
